trans-unit.source: The Java backend of the Workflow Accelerator system is executed using Apache Tomcat. Workflow Accelerator supports Apache Tomcat 64-bit version 8.5. It does not support Apache Tomcat 64-bit 9.

seg-source.mrk: The Java backend of the Workflow Accelerator system is executed using Apache Tomcat.
Workflow Accelerator supports Apache Tomcat 64-bit version 8.5.
It does not support Apache Tomcat 64-bit 9.

target.mrk: Das Java Back End von Workflow Accelerator wird im Apache Tomcat Webserver ausgeführt.
Workflow Accelerator unterstützt Apache Tomcat 64-Bit in der Version 8.5.
Die Version 9 von Apache Tomcat 64-Bit wird nicht unterstützt.

trans-unit.source: You can download the latest installation files for different operating systems from the following site:

seg-source.mrk: You can download the latest installation files for different operating systems from the following site:

target.mrk: Die Tomcat-Installationsdateien erhalten Sie für verschiedene Betriebssysteme hier:

trans-unit.source: In general, please make sure the user executing the Tomcat has read/write permissions for the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps</kbd> directory and its sub-directories.

seg-source.mrk: In general, please make sure the user executing the Tomcat has read/write permissions for the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps</kbd> directory and its sub-directories.

target.mrk: Stellen Sie bitte sicher, dass der Tomcat Lese- und Schreibrechte im Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/webapps</kbd> und den enthaltenen Ordnern hat.

trans-unit.source: If you are using a Windows system, the download site offers a Windows Service Installer (<cite xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">32-bit/64-bit Windows Service Installer</cite>). This installer will install the Apache Tomcat as a Windows service which can be started, stopped and configured over a graphical user interface. The service installer is the recommended way for Windows users to install the Tomcat server. Make sure you execute the installer with administrator privileges.

seg-source.mrk: If you are using a Windows system, the download site offers a Windows Service Installer (<cite xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">32-bit/64-bit Windows Service Installer</cite>).
This installer will install the Apache Tomcat as a Windows service which can be started, stopped and configured over a graphical user interface.
The service installer is the recommended way for Windows users to install the Tomcat server.
Make sure you execute the installer with administrator privileges.

target.mrk: Für Windows lässt sich auf der Tomcat-Seite ein Windows Service Installer (<cite xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">“32-bit/64-bit Windows Service Installer</cite>) herunterladen.
Dieser Installer richtet Apache Tomcat als Windows Service ein, der über eine Desktopanwendung gestartet, gestoppt und weitgehend konfiguriert werden kann.
Wir empfehlen, den Service Installer für die Installation des Tomcat-Servers zu nutzen.
Führen Sie den Installer mit Administratorrechten aus.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, it is recommended to install the Apache Tomcat into a root directory on <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Furthermore, it is recommended to install the Apache Tomcat into a root directory on <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\</kbd>.

target.mrk: Es wird empfohlen, Apache Tomcat in einem root-Ordner unter <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\</kbd> zu installieren.

trans-unit.source: If you are using Linux, consider installing Apache Tomcat using a package manager. On Debian, you can use the Advanced Packaging Tool (APT) and execute one of the following commands:

seg-source.mrk: If you are using Linux, consider installing Apache Tomcat using a package manager.
On Debian, you can use the Advanced Packaging Tool (APT) and execute one of the following commands:

target.mrk: Unter Linux ist es empfehlenswert, Apache Tomcat über den Paketmanager zu installieren.
Unter Debian bietet sich das Advanced Packaging Tool (APT) an:
